message: Nice Feature :) I use it to make a voice message confirmation when i start the deployment
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: How To Make Siri Say Anything
caption: hongkiat.com
description: [Mac only] Siri is the artificial intelligence personal assistant made available on your iPhone. It will answer to all your questions and searches as well as complete tasks you ask it to manage. It’s the perfect assistant anyone can hope for, fitted in the palm-sized gadget. That’s why it’s such ......
